problem.markdown:
>>The frequency of the action potential in the relaxed muscle is<< ( ) 0 Hz ( ) 50 Hz ( ) 60 Hz ( ) 20-5000 Hz
>>EMG deals with the<< ( ) Study of brain activity ( ) Study of Myocardial activity ( ) Study of Muscular activity ( ) Study of Central nervous system
>>In contraction of a skeletal muscle, action potentials are generated in the<< ( ) Motor units ( ) Nerve lesion ( ) Skeletal muscle ( ) Brain
>>The conduction velocity in a motor nerve is normally<< ( ) 100 m/s ( ) 50 m/s ( ) below 40 m/s ( ) 1550 m/s
>>EMG stands for<< ( ) Elecromusclegraph ( ) Electromayogram ( ) Electromyograin ( ) None of above
